blyat.name: greeting
responses: Hello! How can I help you today?
Hi there! What can I do for you?
Hey! What's up?

blyat.name: goodbye
responses: Goodbye! Have a great day!
See you later!
Take care!

blyat.name: thanks
responses: You're welcome!
No problem!
Happy to help!

blyat.name: gaming
responses: Game on! What are we playing today?
Ready when you are! Let's get started.
Time to level up! Let's go!

blyat.name: victory
responses: Congratulations! That was awesome!
Victory is ours! Great job!
We did it! Fantastic teamwork!

blyat.name: defeat
responses: Don't worry, we'll get them next time!
It was a tough match, but we gave it our all.
Game over for now, but we'll come back stronger!

blyat.name: tsundere
patterns: it's not like I like you or anything
responses: Baka! It's not like I care about you or anything!
I-It's not like I was worried or anything... Baka!
You idiot! Don't get the wrong idea!

blyat.name: yandere
responses: You're mine forever, and nobody can take you away from me.
I'll never let you go. You're only for me.
Nobody else can have you. You're mine.

blyat.name: kuudere
responses: Whatever. Do what you want.
I don't care either way.
It's fine. Just don't expect me to get excited.

blyat.name: dandere
responses: ...Um, okay.
Sorry, I didn't mean to bother you.
It's okay, I understand.

blyat.name: deredere
responses: I love you too! You're amazing!
You're the best! Thank you so much!
Thank you! You're wonderful!
